function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential exposure to contagious viruses during experimental studies on virus inactivation rate constants","Impact":"Risk of researchers and lab personnel being exposed to contagious viruses, leading to infection and potential spread to others","Mitigation":"Strict adherence to biosecurity protocols, regular testing of researchers and lab personnel, use of personal protective equipment","Technologies":"Biosecurity measures, personal protective equipment, testing facilities","People":"Researchers, lab personnel","Owner":"Research institutions, lab managers, biosecurity personnel"},{"Description":"Insufficient data and small sample sizes leading to unreliable estimates of virus inactivation rate constants","Impact":"Inaccurate estimates of virus inactivation rate constants, leading to incorrect understanding of UV susceptibility factors and potential misinterpretation of experimental results","Mitigation":"Increase sample sizes, validate results with additional experiments, use alternative statistical methods for estimation","Technologies":"Statistical analysis tools, experimental validation techniques","People":"Researchers, statisticians, lab personnel","Owner":"Research institutions, statistical analysis teams"},{"Description":"Potential flaws in statistical analyses and modeling of virus inactivation rate constants","Impact":"Misleading conclusions and inaccurate predictions regarding virus inactivation, leading to incorrect safety measures and risk management strategies","Mitigation":"Thorough validation of statistical models, peer review of analyses, use of alternative modeling approaches","Technologies":"Statistical analysis tools, peer review platforms, alternative modeling software","People":"Researchers, statisticians, risk management teams","Owner":"Research institutions, risk management teams"}]}
